project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Build a text-based game where players can navigate through different rooms, interact with items, maintain an inventory, and face challenges.

task.name: Design the game layout including rooms and items
Implement inventory system to keep track of items
Create simple challenges for the player to encounter in the rooms
Write tests for the implemented functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
